findings.title: Incorrect token decimal conversions can lead to loss of funds
findings.description: The _convert() function in DAOfiV1Pair is used to accommodate tokens with varying decimals() values, but it implicitly returns 0 for any amount when token.decimals() == resolution, leading to incorrect calculations and potential loss of funds.

findings.title: Pair contracts can be easily blocked
findings.description: The parameters used to define a unique pair are limited, making it possible for pools to be easily blocked by front-running deployments and depositing zero liquidity or immediately withdrawing deposited liquidity. This can lead to permanent blocking of pools.
